organizations.title: Organizations
organizations.description: A list of AWS Organizations to be managed by iambic

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.description: A list of AWS Accounts to be managed by iambic

min_accounts_required_for_wildcard_inclu.title: Min Accounts Required For Wildcard Included Accounts
min_accounts_required_for_wildcard_inclu.description: Iambic will set included_accounts = * on imported resources that exist on all accounts if the minimum number of accounts is met.

region.description: Region identity center is configured on

BaseAWSOrgRule.title: BaseAWSOrgRule
BaseAWSOrgRule.description:
A base model class that provides additional helper methods and
configurations for other models used in IAMbic.

iambic_managed.description: Controls the directionality of iambic changes

AWSOrgAccountRule.title: AWSOrgAccountRule
AWSOrgAccountRule.description:
A base model class that provides additional helper methods and
configurations for other models used in IAMbic.

iambic_managed.description: Controls the directionality of iambic changes

included_accounts.title: Includedaccounts
included_accounts.description: A list of account ids and/or account names this rule applies to. Account ids/names can be represented as a regex and string

excluded_accounts.title: Excludedaccounts
excluded_accounts.description: A list of account ids and/or account names this rule explicitly does not apply to. Account ids/names can be represented as a regex and string

default_region.description: Default region to use when making AWS requests

aws_profile.title: Aws Profile
aws_profile.description: The AWS profile used when making calls to the account

hub_role_arn.title: Hub Role Arn
hub_role_arn.description: The role arn to assume into when making calls to the account

external_id.title: External Id
external_id.description: The external id to use for assuming into a role when making calls to the account

org_name.title: Org Name
org_name.description: Optional friendly name for the organization

org_id.title: Org Id
org_id.description: A unique identifier designating the identity of the organization

org_account_id.title: Org Account Id
org_account_id.description: The AWS Organization's master account ID

identity_center.title: Identity Center
identity_center.description: The AWS Account ID and region of the AWS Identity Center instance to use for this organization

default_rule.title: Default Rule
default_rule.description: The rule used to determine how an organization account should be handled if the account was not found in account_rules.

account_rules.title: Account Rules
account_rules.description: A list of rules used to determine how organization accounts are handled

AWSAccount.title: AWSAccount
AWSAccount.description:
Inherited by the provider class to provide a consistent interface for AccessModelMixin

For AWS, this is the AWS account
For GCP, this is the GCP project
For Okta, this is the IDP domain

default_region.description: Default region to use when making AWS requests

aws_profile.title: Aws Profile
aws_profile.description: The AWS profile used when making calls to the account

hub_role_arn.title: Hub Role Arn
hub_role_arn.description: The role arn to assume into when making calls to the account

external_id.title: External Id
external_id.description: The external id to use for assuming into a role when making calls to the account

iambic_managed.description: Controls the directionality of iambic changes

org_id.title: Org Id
org_id.description: A unique identifier designating the identity of the organization

partition.description: The AWS partition the account is in. Options are aws, aws-us-gov, and aws-cn

variables.title: Variables
variables.description: A list of variables to be used when creating templates

spoke_role_arn.title: Spoke Role Arn
spoke_role_arn.description: (Auto-populated) The role arn to assume into when making calls to the account

assume_role_arn.title: Assume Role Arn
assume_role_arn.description: The role arn to assume into when making calls to the account
